name: ZealSound Gaming Microphone, USB Mic for PC with Noise Cancellation, RGB, Mute, Gain Control, Zero-Latency Monitoring, Boom Arm, Tripod Stand & Pop Filter, for Mac, iPhone, Streaming, Twitch, YouTube
short_description: Studio-Quality Voice Capture, Up to 96 kHz – This gaming microphone delivers clear, detailed speech for streaming, podcasting, voice chat, and video creation. 96 kHz sampling captures more vocal detail, while the cardioid pickup helps reduce side noise from keyboards, fans, and room activity. A built-in noise reduction chip helps lower background sound for a cleaner signal. Use the real-time volume/gain knob to fine-tune levels, helping prevent clipping and keep your voice balanced. The pop filter helps reduce plosives, and the shock mount helps cut desk vibration. Great for Twitch, YouTube, TikTok, Zoom, Discord, online classes, remote meetings, livestreams, and voiceovers.

Plug-and-Play Across Devices (Lightning + USB-C Adapters Included) – Use this USB microphone on Windows PCs/laptops, macOS (MacBook/iMac), ChromeOS (Chromebook), and many Linux systems—no drivers or setup, just plug in and start. The kit includes both a Lightning adapter and a USB-C adapter, so you can connect to supported iPhone/iPad and USB-C phones/tablets (including USB-C iPhone models) without buying extras. Ideal for mobile and desktop recording, Twitch/YouTube streaming, TikTok and Instagram Live, Zoom/Teams/Skype calls, Discord chat, PS4/PS5 party voice, podcasts, interviews, online classes, remote work, voiceovers, ASMR, and gameplay videos.

Boom Arm + Foldable Tripod Stand – Build a flexible setup fast. Use the metal scissor boom arm to place the USB gaming microphone at mouth level for clearer pickup while keeping your desk open, or switch to the foldable tripod for quick tabletop recording and easy storage. The arm extends up to 30.8 in, rotates 360°, and adjusts multiple angles so you can position the mic without blocking your screen—ideal for FPS callouts, Discord raids, Twitch streams, and YouTube gameplay. The desk clamp fits surfaces up to 1.8 in for a stable hold. Fold the arm away to save space, or use the tripod on any table for Zoom calls, Teams, online classes, podcasts, gameplay videos, voiceovers, and TikTok LIVE.

One-Touch Mute Button with Red RGB Mute Indicator – Tap to mute instantly and tap again to unmute, so you can pause audio during livestreams, meetings, or team chat without opening software settings. When muted, the mic displays a large, bright red RGB lighting effect that’s easy to see at a glance, even on camera—perfect for quick status checks during streaming. Use mute when you need to cough or sneeze, answer the door, take a phone call, speak to family or roommates, talk off-stream, or stop sudden background noise. Helps avoid hot-mic moments on Twitch, Discord, Zoom, Skype, and PS4/PS5 party chat, keeping your audio clean and controlled.

Zero-Latency Real-Time Monitoring – Plug headphones into the 3.5mm jack to hear your voice instantly with zero delay, so you can control your sound in real time. Monitor helps you keep a steady distance, catch plosives, breathing, and room echo early, and adjust gain before and during a session. Perfect for gaming comms and streaming: hear yourself over game audio for clear FPS callouts, Discord raids, and PS4/PS5 party chat without yelling. Also great for podcasts, interviews, voiceovers, ASMR-style recording, online classes, and Zoom calls—quickly check levels, reposition the mic on the boom arm or tripod, and stay consistent across Twitch, YouTube, and TikTok livestreams.

Bottom-Mounted Gear Volume/Gain Knob – Unlike many USB microphones with side knobs that are awkward to reach or easy to bump, this mic places the control on the bottom base for quick adjustment while it stays on your boom arm or tripod. The gear-textured dial feels grippy and precise, giving you confident control even with one hand. Dial down to prevent clipping when you shout after a win, and dial up for softer voices, late-night comms, or distance speaking. Great for FPS callouts, PS4/PS5 party chat, Discord raids, Twitch streaming, and recording gameplay videos, plus Zoom meetings, podcasts, and voiceovers—adjust mid-match without taking your eyes off the screen or pausing your game.

Detachable Pop Filter + Shock Mount – Get cleaner audio right out of the box. The removable pop filter helps cut popping sounds from P/B words and reduces breath noise for clearer speech, while staying low-profile so it won’t block your monitor during gaming or streaming. Pop it off anytime for easy cleaning, packing, or a more open sound. The shock mount helps absorb vibration from desk bumps, typing, and controller movement, keeping your voice steadier on stream and in recordings. Pair these with the cardioid pickup and onboard gain control for clearer podcasts, voiceovers, ASMR-style narration, Discord chat, and Zoom/Teams meetings—no extra accessories or complicated software needed.

RGB Lighting with One-Button Control – Make your setup look stream-ready in seconds. This RGB USB microphone features bright on-camera lighting with multiple solid colors plus dynamic gradient effects, creating an eye-catching glow that instantly upgrades your desk vibe. Match your keyboard, PC case, or room theme for FPS nights, Discord hangouts, Twitch streams, YouTube videos, and TikTok LIVE—your mic becomes part of the scene, not just a tool. Long-press to turn RGB off for a clean, distraction-free look during Zoom meetings, online classes, podcast recording, or late-night sessions. Compact design won’t block your screen.

Made for Gamers, Podcasters, Streamers, and Content Creators – Built for FPS and team play where fast callouts win rounds, plus co-op sessions, raids, and late-night party chat with friends. Great for Twitch streams, YouTube gameplay, and TikTok LIVE when you’re narrating matches, reacting to clutch moments, hosting watch parties, or chatting with viewers. Also ideal for podcasters, vloggers, and creators making commentary, interviews, tutorials, unboxings, and short-form clips. Fits students and remote workers for Zoom/Teams classes, meetings, presentations, and study groups. A practical gift for teens, gamers, and first-time creators setting up a desk studio.

What’s in the Box, Ready to Start – You get a complete starter bundle for a clean desk setup: RGB USB microphone, scissor boom arm, desk clamp (fits desktops up to 1.8 in), foldable tripod stand, shock mount, detachable pop filter, long 78.7-inch USB cable, Lightning adapter, USB-C adapter, and user manual. Set it up your way in minutes—mount on the boom arm for a studio-style streaming position, or use the foldable tripod for quick tabletop recording and easy storage. Built to cover PC/Mac and supported mobile devices, so you can go from gaming chat to podcasts, videos, or calls without shopping for extra parts. Backed by ZealSound brand support for added peace of mind.
